website_summaries.verdict: A light moisturizer that is great for those with oily or combination skin.
pros: Great for combination and oily skin as it moisturizes without being heavy or leaving skin greasy
Helps minimize pores and absorbs quickly
cons: Not ideal for those with dry skin

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: The cream itself is great for my skin, but there are plenty of other products that are the same for a fraction of a cost. It also arrived with a huge air pocket inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I turned 50 this year and my skin has been getting super thirsty- this is the best cream for quenching it. A little goes a long way. Really beautiful cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer ever
customer_reviews.text: Tatcha was first given me as a gift. It felt like silk on my face. I do believe it has reduced some wrinkles on my 66 year old face. Tatcha is my new face routine.
customer_reviews.author: Moogie

customer_reviews.title: Supreme moisture
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly moist; goes on like cool soft butter. My skin loves it. People noticed the difference and asked me about my skin regimen Definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Twizzly

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Very light
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very light, yet very moisturizing. I have oily skin and this works well with my makeup as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Tiller

customer_reviews.title: Start filling them up if you want people to order more
customer_reviews.text: You pay a high price for not even a full container
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Although feels moisturizing. I detect fragrance which is is irritating and a little alcohol
customer_reviews.author: Kikiricat

customer_reviews.title: Wow !
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Chemical Engineer. I am minimalist when it comes to anything that's not natural, whether it's in food, skin care, home or car. Yes, there's chemicals hiding everywhere. I have even tried making my own moisturizing lotion at home. Not even close to this one. This one will instantly hydrate and believe me or not, it makes you realize how thirsty your skin was for this much needed hydration. Love the way it feels instantly and for hours afterwards <3
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this moisturizer before and loved it but was pretty disappointed when I opened my product to see the a good chunk of it missing. You think if you pay $70 for a product it would actually be full, or at least not missing a sizeable amount from the container. Very disappointed. Apart from my terrible experience, the cream is amazing and lightweight and smells divine. Just wish I got all that I paid for!!! 😡
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn L

customer_reviews.title: Best cream ever!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best face cream I have ever used. My face gets oily easily with creams and this one moisturizes without the greasy feeling. My pores have gotten smaller and overall brighter skin. Love this, I would give it more stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Picard family

customer_reviews.title: We all need to moisturize!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Tatcha Water Cream moisturizer for a year, and it's the lightest moisturizer I've ever used. It's made with Japanese Wild Rose. Very pleasant scent. It also comes with a beautiful scoop, so you can regulate how much you use, which is not that much. I also apply to my neck and décolletage.
customer_reviews.author: DezisDiVa

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Cream!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is ABSOLUTELY FABULOUS!!! It makes my facial skin feel so moist and hydrated. The name "Water Cream" it's everything the name claims. I LOVE this cream so much I have ordered my second jar! I comes with this cute GOLD SPOON and you put just enough on the end of this spoon and ITS JUST ENOUGH too cover your entire face! Ladies you will not go wrong when you order this CREAM!!!! It just makes my face look and feel so Radiant.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Brockenborough

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about purchasing this because it was expensive and I was afraid I wasn't going to like it but I absolutely love this product. I have decently oily skin, and this moisturizer has cured that amazingly. My skin is so moisturized and smoother, love love love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kiara

customer_reviews.title: This product changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many moisturizers and NOTHING compares to this. I never thought I’d spent this much on a moisturizer but I’d say it’s worth every penny. It makes my skin feel so amazing and my skin texture has changed from using it. I use it before I put my makeup on and it makes such a dramatic difference. I’d highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Decent cream, skimpt on product inside
customer_reviews.text: A good cream, but upon arrival a huge air pocket was inside so i did not get my money’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy delivery...perfect packaging
customer_reviews.text: I have used this cream in the past so I was already familiar with it and love everything about it including how light it feels on the skin. What I was pleasantly surprised with was how fast it arrived and that it was in perfect condition (the packaging was intact). The bottle also had the seal on insuring that it had not been opened (see pic). It was my first time ordering beauty products from amazon instead of Sephora. Btw, the price between both places is the exact same.
customer_reviews.author: NYS

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing but air bubble...
customer_reviews.text: I saw the comments complaining about the air bubble and I thought I was spared.. but as I used it more I realized the bottle is empty on the left side. For a 70$ product you've got to be kidding. Why is the packaging so large then?? It's amazing though. My skin is moisturized AF and all my dry patches are gone. Still feel cheated though..if you have large pores. This gives you a glowy look and that can sometimes emphasize them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price tag
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. For me it's too thin, I'm used to something a little thicker...I know this is meant to be thin. The scent is ok, but definitely not worth the price tag in my opinion. My Maskcara milk moisturizer is better...
customer_reviews.author: BriWadd

customer_reviews.title: High hopes - dashed dreams
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product - I have combination skin that is prone to breaking out (adult acne). This only seemed to contribute to breaking out more. When I stopped using it, the acne would stop, but when I would start again, it would come back in a few days. It definitely felt great on my skin and smells lovely, but I'm worried to use it again for fear of breaking out.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G.

customer_reviews.title: Best face cream I can find!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many face creams.. expensive and cheap..I even tried the 12 step Korean face routine.. my skin either breaks out..or I get dry patches everywhere.. after consistent use of this product twice a day...my skin is baby soft within about 2 weeks. There is something special about this face cream. At least for me. I feel it is a fair price.. it lasts a really long time and I see results.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING!!! If you have extremely dry skin and apply to you face twice a day you will see a remarkable difference in a week or so. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: BECKY SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: BEST MOISTURIZER EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best moisturizer out there. One of these jars lasted me from December of 2019 to October of 2020. It is pricy, but it lasted me so long and worth every penny. It’s light weight, doesn’t make your face feel oily or greasy, and smells amazing. It works well with other products like overnight masks. I love it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This creme has changed the moisturizer game for me permanently, I can never go back!! Not only was it very moisturizing, I just loved how my face felt when using it. I enjoy the scent; very subtle. I’ll admit that the texture when first applying was new to me but after a few days I was used to the feeling. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: It is a tall drink of water for your skin. I have oily skin, I apply it at night and in the morning the results are visible.
customer_reviews.author: Carina Ash

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Drunk Elephant products for over a year and decided to give Tatcha’s Water Cream a try since I’ve been hearing great things about it. It’s been about a week and my skin has been GLOWING. I love how lightweight, yet moisturizing this cream is. I also have very sensitive skin and adapted immediately to these ingredients. I will likely not be going back to Drunk Elephant and am excited to try out more of Tatcha’s products!
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to spend money on a good skin care routine.. I bought the cleansing oil by Tatcha and I loved it. This water cream has done nothing but give me red rashes and left my skin feeling like it had been sunburnt. There’s other cheaper options. Go to beauty pie subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal P.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good for sensitive skin, lightweight, oil free. I have rosacea and it doesn’t make me breakout. Takes time to dry. Sometimes makes my skin red immediately after application.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Nash

customer_reviews.title: Luxury & Bliss
customer_reviews.text: Luxury item with unique feel to it. Pleasant subtle fragrance. This is expensive but a nice treat to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! Shipped fast and in perfect Condition!! Even came in new box. Love this cream! Goes on creamy and rich! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Appeared to have been used
customer_reviews.text: Fist time trying this product. Was excited to receive it, but after opening there was a huge dug out hole missing from the cream. The box was not sealed with cellophane plastic as you would get with Estee Lauder, so I'm wondering was it missing because it was used? Does it normally come with plastic sealing? I am returning but ordering another to give a second chance. I should be receiving a serum and mask product today.
customer_reviews.author: barryc

customer_reviews.title: Damage to box
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product before in store. I bought through amazon this time. Box was damaged and wet. Product was ok, but sent back due to damaged box and this was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ansley Garrett

customer_reviews.title: authentic?
customer_reviews.text: i've bought this directly from tatcha... this doesn't seem to be authentic tatcha product... it smells weird and too watery.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: I liked that its light on the skin.perfect to use during warm weather. Doesnt moisturize much during winter season. Havnt noticed much on its effect.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie mitchel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This product is expensive, but it lasts and lasts. You only need to use a very small amount for a wonderful result. Skin is moist and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not worth $68
customer_reviews.text: although this moisturizer comes with a very aromatic and pleasant opening experience, the moisturizer feels sticky and does not absorb into the skin. the fragrance is overwhelmingly strong and could be irritating on your skin. overall there are much better moisturizers for combo skin.
customer_reviews.author: Omer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This works and I would pay even more for it because it is such a good product! I wish I had this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Janet anderson

customer_reviews.title: ANCE PRONE PEOPLE DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Caused me to break out a lot. I figured a high end beauty product like this wouldnt cause me to break out. I was wrong. Save your money and you skin. Also enlarged my pores. My skin after using it was absolutely horrible
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: LOVEIT!
customer_reviews.text: Silky and moisturizing - love the packaging, too. Am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: J. F. Stolle

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Light
customer_reviews.text: This cream is one I’ve used for awhile. It feels light and refreshing and a lovely way to start the day. I don’t wear makeup that often but this keeps my skin hydrated and feeling fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie Morris

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Truly a wonderful feeling cream and I like that it’s water based for nighttime use, but it often feels like it’s just sitting on top of my skin and not really hydrating it.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable cream.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it applies to my skin. It contains a nice ingredient that moisturizes so well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: It should moisturize longer
customer_reviews.text: Loved the smell and packaging. Wish it moisturized better. Expensive for the product. More put into packaging
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Money was not worth the contents of the jar.
customer_reviews.text: I paid near $70 for this product to get a half empty container. Not worth the money to get taken advantage of with the amount of product provided. The cream is great but I wouldn’t pay $70 to get a half full jar again.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite moisturizer! Feels so hydrating but doesn't feel like you have any on!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Purchase this change your skin for the better
customer_reviews.text: This will change your life amazing nighttime moisturizer and primer for makeup
customer_reviews.author: ENTHUSIAST

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for my face. Makes it glowing and only need to use a small pea amount.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer was exactly what I have been looking for! It is not oily at all and my skin just loves it.
customer_reviews.author: TWashington

customer_reviews.title: You have to try this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I go through it too quickly though is my only negative.
customer_reviews.author: Merritt Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Moisture, light scent, lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Good value! Used it over winter to keep my skin moisturized. Worked really well but it did run out faster than some other brands. For the price, I'd order it again.
customer_reviews.author: msim1392

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love the package but the cream is lame. I feel nothing. not Moisturizing at all. Super expensive for no reason
customer_reviews.author: guy

customer_reviews.title: Great for hydration but also light texture
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It’s amazing for hydration but also very light and not heavy. My skin just drinks it up! It’s expensive but I can afford it and it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Dorsch

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Loveeee it! My pores have shown improvement, they are in fact starting to look smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too watery
customer_reviews.text: This would be good for someone who does not need a lot of moisture. It is watery and does not dry very quickly. Once it does dry, it is very dry like you didn’t put any on at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Q. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: oily dense cream, it is not suitable for owners of delicate skin!
customer_reviews.text: First, the package was opened, it was unsealed before arriving to me !!! The packaging is tattered and dirty! this cream is marketed as without added oils, but it is not! It turned out to be very dense and greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Iren

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special here
customer_reviews.text: This felt ok going on but I didn't see any change in my skin at all. Not worth the price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite cream ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd jar, I fell in love after first use,I am 45 and Ihave combination skin, my skin loves this
customer_reviews.author: jody logo

customer_reviews.title: So Light and Fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It is so light weight and easy to put on under makeup. If you live in an area where there's a lot of heat, it's a great product because it doesn't run off and get oily when you sweat. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this cream as a sample and fell in love. I use it morning and night. I have combination skin and this cream makes my skin feel balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Cami Hohenwarter

customer_reviews.title: Tatcha is the best
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous skin care products and Tatcha is by far the best. I love the way my skin feels and the scent is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I loved the other one. This one just doesn't seem to hydrate as well.
customer_reviews.author: RACHEL

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little pricey but works wonder on my skin. I have normal to dry skin. I’m mostly dry around my T- area and this does not leave my face greasy after use. When I open it for the first time it was not full like I wanted it to be. Other than that I love the moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Catrina Kirkwood

customer_reviews.title: For the price is worth it love it
customer_reviews.text: It is so amazing 😍 plus a does a big difference when you Apply makeup on 😊 and I use at night for bedtime leave my face so soft and nice 👍🏻 It cost a lot but at the end of the day is What worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is worth it
customer_reviews.text: Although it is really moisturizing and my skin felt less oily the moment I applied it, it has a lot of fragrance which in my opinion can be bad.
customer_reviews.author: German Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Heavy product on the face. Smells less then fragrant. Makes my face greasy. I used a dime size amount and it still comes out heavy and greasy on the face. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is the only moisturizer that I can use that doesn't make my rosaisia worse.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!!
customer_reviews.text: The cream it’s amazing, worth every single penny, my skin has improved a lot since I started using it. A little goes a long way, it’s pricy but totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Best Skincare line ever
customer_reviews.text: By far the best skincare line l have ever tried. I am 60 and have always used luxury skincare. Tatcha is my forever holy grail product. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Best skin cream
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin. This prouct works amazing. No irritation and my skin feels soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING STUFF!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! This is the second bottle I purchased. The water cream is just like it says. Goes on light, feels like water but very moisturizing!
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: Smaller pores
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light weight moisturizer that has not caused my acne prone skin to break out more than normal and has really helped with other signs of aging, especially with the size of my pores and the rough bumpy skin.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Lovell

customer_reviews.title: Love me some Tatcha!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with Tatcha! I have many products from their line. The water cream is lightweight, and delivers amazing moisture! I love the water cream!
customer_reviews.author: Tory B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this moisturizer! I have very sensitive skin and I’m always hesitant trying new products for it, but this product was amazing. My skin feels so hydrated and looks incredible! Highly recommend this moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried so many other moisturizers and this is by far the best. It does not irritate my skin. It leaves my skin very soft and improves the texture of my skin. It’s worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but doesnt last long it always seems to have gap in cream so maybe not full amount
customer_reviews.text: I only use a small amount morning and night but have found it doesnt last long only about 2 or 3 weeks. This is the second jar that's run out so quickly so really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Is this real Tatcha cream?
customer_reviews.text: I have used Tatcha cream before and my skins felt much softer. It feels like this product is watered down and doesn’t provide the same results as the product purchased directly from Tatcha.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter C.

customer_reviews.title: I’ll get it again!
customer_reviews.text: Product is super smooth with a rose scent that is undeniable, but subtle and not over powering. Leaves your skin feeling super smooth. Beautiful packaging and container also!
customer_reviews.author: Evie T.

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!!
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite moisturizer ever!!!! My skin looks and feels glowy all day!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Dream Cream!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely cream! I was afraid that it might irritate my sensitive skin, but it doesn’t—not at all. My face loves it as much as I do! Very moisturising and perfect consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Brien

customer_reviews.title: Tatcha
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely obsessed with this because it leaves my skin hydrated & refreshed without the greasy or oily feeling of other lotions
customer_reviews.author: Elise F

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my sensitive skin. Very few products do not make me break out. Not oily, goes on super light then seals in the moisture. Love love love this
customer_reviews.author: Laura Faria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful moisture. Feels like liquid silk going on your face and is the perfect face cream for moisturizing without heavy ingredients that can clog pores.
customer_reviews.author: A E  Hunt

customer_reviews.title: New beauty staple
customer_reviews.text: For the price I was hoping this would be worth it, and it is. This has helped my dry winter skin to be as soft as ever and at the same time not oily.
customer_reviews.author: Zac Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: I like the product, its make your face moisturizes very well.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, its make your face moisturizes well.
customer_reviews.author: NianxiSun

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight cream
customer_reviews.text: I loved the consistency of the cream. I cant rate it completely because I have only used it for 2 days. Check back in in a month.
customer_reviews.author: Nazly Shariati

customer_reviews.title: Good light moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have normal skin (more to the drier side) and this was light for me, i would have to moisturize twice before makeup.
customer_reviews.author: caLew

customer_reviews.title: Water Cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream absorbs very easily. Not greasy at all. I will definitely reorder this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Do not order the product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible, it was half empty like someone used it and there was a hair in it. Complete garbage. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It's so light ,not at all oily.Only day cream I wear now
customer_reviews.text: My daughter-in-law gave me this for a gift.This was the first day moisturizer I really loved. I'm 70+ This is perfect for my ever thinning skin
customer_reviews.author: CMB

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, and leaves skin soft
customer_reviews.text: Very light and refreshing, but does the trick. Not like some heavy or greasy moisturizers, this soaks in
customer_reviews.author: Laura Grossman

customer_reviews.title: air pocket
customer_reviews.text: i love this product, however there was a huge air pocket inside when i opened it and i read other reviews saying this as well. i don’t think i got my moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Fake product!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was not the original and I had to throw it away. The smell was overbearing to say the least. Be very careful ordering beauty products from amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: jade concepcion

customer_reviews.title: Worth the value
customer_reviews.text: It’s luxe. I love the packaging and all the details of its bottle with a little spoon on top of its lid cover. It is non-comedogenic, super hydrating cream and it is light weight
customer_reviews.author: Shareen Mohamad

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. A little amount goes a long way and it doesn’t make your skin feel oily. Plus it smells great!
customer_reviews.author: JoannaVita

customer_reviews.title: Nice product to use on skin.
customer_reviews.text: I used for many years. I would like to share this Oil-Free water cream for all of you. Good for the summer time.
customer_reviews.author: Dorisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for the summer
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer for combination skin especially n the hot summer months
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: This order arrived right on time! My daughter loves all of it, it was her birthday!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this product and she is beautiful and has flawless skin!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this line of products!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Tatcha water cream! My skin is very sensitive and this is the only product that I can use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. Boulden

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious Feel
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful presentation. Luxurious feel on your skin and a light refreshing scent
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Tatcha is incredible!
customer_reviews.text: All products from this manufacturer are amazing. Packaging is beautiful too! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi S

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing and feels great on your face!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this!! I have my mom, sister and one of my best friends hooked too!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Davis

product_meta.title: Tatcha The Water Cream: Oil-Free, Optimal Hydration Moisturizer For Pure Poreless Skin - 50 ml | 1.7 oz
feature_bullets: OIL-FREE: This oil-free, water cream releases a burst of skin-improving Japanese nutrients, powerful botanicals and optimal hydration for pure, poreless skin.
PROVIDES NUTRIENT-RICH, BALANCED HYDRATION: Unique water-burst cream breaks upon application to deeply deliver treatment benefits, hydrating without leaving skin sticky or greasy.

CLARIFIES AND REFINES skin with pure, powerful Japanese botanicals: Japanese Wild Rose visibly tightens pores and smoothes skin texture. Japanese Leopard Lily helps control excess oil and clarify skin by encouraging natural skin turnover.

DELIVERS ANTI-AGING JAPANESE SUPERFOODS: Hadasei-3, an anti-aging trinity of green tea, rice & algae, restores healthy-looking, youthful radiance. Imparts a subtle, shine-free glow with a touch of 23-karat gold.

FORMULATED WITHOUT: Mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, parabens, urea, DEA, TEA or phthalates. Oil-free. Non-comedogenic. Non-irritating. Non-sensitizing. Dermatologist tested. Cruelty-free.
